mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mystore.`order` (order_id, user_id, product_id, product_price, quantity, total_price, order_date) VALUES(#{order_id}, #{user_id}, #{product_id}, #{product_price}, #{quantity}, #{total_price}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM mystore.`order` WHERE user_id=#{user_id} and order_id=#{order_id};
